If the sex worker - and make no mistake, that's what they are, regardless of their sex - comes away psychologically damaged, well, that rather goes with the territory of the profession. That is their problem, not anyone elses. In case they hadn't heard, prostitution is illegal. Why should taxpayers be burdened with caring for their psychological ills?
